text: The women's team sabre competition at the 2014 Asian Games in Goyang was held on 23 September at the Goyang Gymnasium. ==Schedule== All times are Korea Standard Time (UTC+09:00) {|class = "wikitable" style="text-align:center;" ! width=220|Date ! width=50|Time ! width=150|Event |- | rowspan=3|Tuesday, 23 September 2014 || 09:00 || Quarterfinals |- | 10:10 || Semifinals |- | 18:00 || bgcolor=ffffcc|Gold medal match |} ==Seeding== The teams were seeded taking into account the results achieved by competitors representing each team in the individual event. {| class=wikitable style="text-align:center" !rowspan=2 width=40|Rank !rowspan=2 width=250|Team !colspan=2|Fencer !rowspan=2 width=40|Total |- !width=40|1 !width=40|2 |- |1||align=left| ||1||2||3 |- |2||align=left| ||3||3||6 |- |3||align=left| ||5||7||12 |- |4||align=left| ||6||10||16 |- |5||align=left| ||8||13||21 |- |6||align=left| ||11||14||25 |- |7||align=left| ||9||—||26 |} ==Results== ==Final standing== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" !width=40|Rank !width=250|Team |- | |align=left| Hwang Seon-a Kim Ji-yeon Lee Ra-jin Yoon Ji-su |- | |align=left| Li Fei Qian Jiarui Shen Chen Yu Xinting |- | |align=left| Au Sin Ying Karen Chang Jenny Ho Lam Hin Wai |- | |align=left| Diana Pamansha Tamara Pochekutova Tatyana Prikhodko Yuliya Zhivitsa |- |5||align=left| Bùi Thị Thu Hà Nguyễn Thị Lệ Dung Nguyễn Thị Thanh Loan Nguyễn Thị Thủy Chung |- |6||align=left| Reni Anggraini Diah Permatasari Ima Sapitri |- |7||align=left| Misaki Emura Maho Hamada Ayaka Mukae |} ==References== *Women's Team Sabre Results ==External links== *Official website Women sabre
title: Fencing at the 2014 Asian Games – Women's team sabre
